generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a fence and adjacent to a building.
- building: Several buildings are visible along both sides of the road, including a white building on the left and a multi-story building on the right.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the right side of the road, separating the sidewalk from the building.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, likely supporting signs or lighting fixtures.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the fence.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along both sides of the road, providing shade and greenery.
- terrain: Grass and other vegetation are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalks.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: The front of a car, including the Mercedes-Benz emblem, is visible at the bottom of the image, indicating the perspective is from inside a vehicle.
